name: Shoot Back
description:
Just shoot the bad guys with a gun you obviously can't handle, but it's too awesome not to use so you'll find a way.

F11 FOR FULLSCREEN (Only works in game not in menu)

A and D/Left and Right to move

R to COMMIT SUICIDE (reset)

Supports controller

Click to shoot

Kill all enemies to proceed

Try to beat it it's pretty easy~ (Not really you'll never beat it)

It is definitely possible to beat but you need to know how the mechanics interact: Hitting an enemy with a bullet reloads you gun, the explosions push everything away including enemies, also don't kill all enemies as soon as you see them or you won't have a way back!
